version_description:
***
Download all the editions of the season camera - 'SPRING', 'SUMMER', 'AUTUMN', 'WINTER'
and express your favorite seasons anytime, anywhere!
***

#. See photos by folder.
Folder separation makes it easier to find photos!

#. Move to edit mode more easily.
When you find a picture you want to edit on the CAMERA screen, go directly to the EDITING screen.
Press the 'Filter' button on the bottom right to go directly to the editing screen!

#. Use the stable reliably.
We've fixed problems with truncation and very occasional app termination!

+ Good camera to take a self-shot! +
- A bug that the face is enlarged is fixed.
- Filters have been improved to make your face look nicer when you take a self-portrait.

+ Smart Brightness Control +
- Brightness automatically adjusted to ambient lighting.
- When you want to make detailed adjustments, touch the shooting screen.

+ Bug fixes +
- Fixed occasional screen breaks at 9:16 ratio.

+ Good camera to take a self-shot!
- A bug that the face is enlarged is fixed.
- Filters have been improved to make your face look nicer when you take a self-portrait.

+ Smart Brightness Control +
- Brightness automatically adjusted to ambient lighting.
- When you want to make detailed adjustments, touch the shooting screen.

+ Support iPhone X +
- Enjoy the perfect layout on the your new iPhone

+ Bug fixes +
- Fixed occasional screen breaks at 9:16 ratio.
- Fixed a problem where filter values are not applied properly.
